MAILQUEUE_RESTRICTED.title: Send Restrictions
MAILQUEUE_RESTRICTED.description: A comma separated list of email addresses and user IDs, only these users will receive emails for testing. Default: Leave blank, no restrictions.

MAILQUEUE_PER_CYCLE.title: Process Per Cycle
MAILQUEUE_PER_CYCLE.description: How many emails to processed per cycle, cycles keep running until queue cooldown reached

MAILQUEUE_COOLDOWN_AFTER.title: Cooldown Point
MAILQUEUE_COOLDOWN_AFTER.description: How many seconds into the run will the queue stop looking of new items to send, give the queue time to finish current cycle before next start

MAILQUEUE_QUEUE_WAIT.title: Empty Queue Wait
MAILQUEUE_QUEUE_WAIT.description: Seconds to wait before re-checking an empty queue

MAILQUEUE_DEBUG.title: Queue Debug Log
MAILQUEUE_DEBUG.description: Log debug output from the send methods

MAILQUEUE_AUTO_RETRY.title: Auto Retry Failed
MAILQUEUE_AUTO_RETRY.description: Automatically retry failed send attempts until retry limit has been reached

MAILQUEUE_RETRY_LIMIT.title: Send Retry Limit
MAILQUEUE_RETRY_LIMIT.description: Automatically delete a notification after the send retry limit has been reached
